title: my gift
body: i had riot kayle before and i got the icon but not my gift or rp its 29 september should i send a ticket(sry for my bad eglish)

replies.body: The deadline is the 30th, so if you don't have anything after the 30th passes, please let me know.
its 1 october and i didnt get the gift

Thanks for letting me know. We're handling these through [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so I recommend submitting one so our specialists can take care of this with you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Could you put this in the main client – I think it affects a number of users? (I also have yet to receive the gift skin.)

I've just put in a support ticket. I feel pretty about bad having to do that  – and having to bother your support team with that – honestly.
